summary: The story of the 1941 Goodwill Tour to South America made by Walt Disney and his staff.

Chazarreta Ruiz|Herbert Ryman|Cindy Sears|Ted Sears|Webb Smith|Frank Thomas|Jeanette Thomas|Charles Wolcott
title: Walt & El Grupo
